user_pass_text.en: A service has requested you to authenticate yourself. Please enter your username and password in the form below.

help_header.en: Help! I don't remember my password.

help_text.en: Too bad! - Without your username and password you cannot authenticate yourself for access to the service. There may be someone that can help you. Consult the help desk at your organization!

error_nopassword.en: You sent something to the login page, but for some reason the password was not sent. Try again please.

change_home_org_text.en: You have chosen %HOMEORG% as your home organization. If this is wrong you may choose another one.
